Html: While Creating the StoreManager Controller..this error is occuring... plz help..

its the connectionString 's problem. just replace the said ConnString with the default one, create the controller, and undo the replace.
replace the
<connectionStrings>
<add name="MusicStoreEntities"
 connectionString="Data Source=|DataDirectory|MvcMusicStore.sdf"
 providerName="System.Data.SqlServerCe.4.0"/>
</connectionStrings>

with somthing similar this one:
<connectionStrings>
<add name="DefaultConnection" providerName="System.Data.SqlClient" connectionString="Data Source=(LocalDb)\v11.0;Initial Catalog=aspnet-MvcMusicStore-20140428000250;Integrated Security=SSPI;AttachDBFilename=|DataDirectory|\aspnet-MvcMusicStore-20140428000250.mdf" />
</connectionStrings>

or something similar.its the Provider 's problem I think

Hi Edwards,
The solution is simple:
  1. Make sure your connection String is okay
  2. Create StoreManagerController before you install NuGet Packages.... (if you need to install any). If you have installed any package you might likely repeat the process.
    Hope this will help
